alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Barrow, east central Gwinnett, southeastern Banks, north central Walton, Jackson and northwestern Madison Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Pocataligo to Bold Springs, and moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winder, Jefferson, Commerce, Danielsville, Auburn, Dacula, Statham, Arcade, Nicholson, Bethlehem, Ila, Between, Carl, Fort Yargo State Park, Windsor, Harbin, Nicholasville, Pocataligo, Bear Creek Reservoir and Peach State Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
